tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE injury_tracking (
    injury_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    injury_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    injury_date DATE NOT NULL,
    recovery_status VARCHAR(50),
    recovery_date DATE,
    therapy_sessions INT
)

CREATE TABLE injury_history (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    injury_type VARCHAR(50),
    injury_date DATE,
    recovery_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE physical_therapy_sessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    therapist_id UUID,
    session_date DATE,
    therapy_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE physical_therapy_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_id INT,
  session_date DATE,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  exercises_completed TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE injury_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  injury_date DATE,
  injury_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_progress (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  recovery_date DATE,
  recovery_status VARCHAR(50),
  recovery_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE physical_therapy_sessions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  session_date DATE,
  session_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE injury_prevention (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  activity_name VARCHAR(100),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE injury_history (
  injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  injury_date DATE,
  recovery_status VARCHAR(20),
  recovery_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_progress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_id INT,
  progress_date DATE,
  recovery_percentage INT,
  doctor_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (injury_id) REFERENCES injury_history(injury_id)
);

CREATE TABLE physical_therapy_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  progress_id INT,
  session_date DATE,
  exercises_completed TEXT,
  therapist_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (progress_id) REFERENCES recovery_progress(progress_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE therapists (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  years_of_experience INT,
  expert_injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  clinic_location VARCHAR(100)
);
